Verses: 1 pinbu, Janangal Muraiyittukkondirundhaargal; Adhu Karththarudaiya Sevigalil Pollaappaayirundhadhu; Karththar Adhaik Kettapodhu, Avarudaiya Kobam Moondadhu;karththarudaiya Akkini Avargalukkulle Patriyerindhu, Paalayaththin Kadaisiyilirundha Silaraip Patchiththadhu.
2 appozhudhu Janangal Moseyai Nokkik Kooppittaargal; Mose Karththarai Nokki Vinnappampanninaan; Udane Akkini Avindhupoyitru.
3 karththarudaiya Akkini Avargalukkulle Patriyerindhadhinaal, Avvidaththukkuth Thaperaa Endru Perittaan.
4 pinbu Avargalukkul Irundha Palajaadhiyaana Anniya Janangal Migundha Ichchaiyullavargalaanaargal; Isravel Puththirarum Thirumba Azhudhu, Namakku Iraichchiyaip Pusikkakkoduppavar Yaar?
5 naam Egipthile Kirayamillaamal Saappitta Machchangalaiyum, Vellarikkaaigalaiyum, Kommattikkaaigalaiyum, Keeraigalaiyum, Vengaayangalaiyum, Vellaippoondugalaiyum Ninaikkirom.
6 ippozhudhu Nammudaiya Ullam Vaadippogiradhu; Indha Mannaavaiththavira, Nammudaiya Kangalukku Munbaaga Verondrum Illaiye Endru Sonnaargal.
7 andha Mannaa Koththumalli Vidhaiyammaaththiramum, Adhin Niram Muththuppolavum Irundhadhu.

8 janangal Poi Adhaip Porukkikkonduvandhu, Endhirangalil Araiththaavadhu Uralgalil Idiththaavadhu, Paanaigalil Samaippaargal; Adhai Appangalumaaga Suduvaargal; Adhin Rusi Pudhu Oliva Enneyin Rusipolirundhadhu.
9 iravile Paalayaththinmel Panipeyyumpodhu, Mannaavum Adhinmel Vizhum.
10 andhandha Vamsangalai Serndha Janangal Thangal Thangal Koodaaravaasalil Nindru Azhugiradhai Mose Kettaan; Karththarukku Migavum Kobam Moondadhu; Moseyin Paarvaikkum Adhu Pollaappaayirundhadhu.

11 appozhudhu Mose Karththarai Nokki: Neer Indha Janangal Ellaarudaiya Baaraththaiyum Enmel Sumaththinadhinaal, Umadhu Adiyaanukku Ubaththiravam Varappanninadhenna? Ummudaiya Kangalil Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaiyaadhe Ponadhenna?

12 ivargaludaiya Pidhaakkalukku Naan Aanaiyittukkoduththa Dhesaththukku Nee Ivargalai Mulaiyungira Paalaganaith Thagappan Sumandhukondupovadhupola, Un Maarbile Anaiththukkondupo Endru Neer Ennode Sollumpadi Indha Janangalaiyellaam Garppandhariththeno? Ivargalaip Petradhu Naano?
13 indha Janangal Ellaarukkum Kodukkiradharku Enakku Iraichchi Engeyirundhu Varum? Enakku Iraichchikodu Endru Ennaip Paarththu Azhugiraargale.
14 indha Janangalellaaraiyum Naan Oruvanaaith Thaangak Koodaadhu; Enakku Idhu Minjina Baaramaayirukkiradhu.
15 ummudaiya Kangalile Enakkuk Kirubai Kidaiththadhaanaal, Ippadi Enakku Seyyaamal, En Ubaththiravaththai Naan Kaanaadhapadikku Ippozhudhe Ennaik Kondrupodum Endru Vendikkondaan.

16 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Isravel Janangalukku Moopparum Thalaivarumaanavargal Innaar Endru Nee Arindhirukkiraaye, Andha Moopparil Ezhubadhu Peraik Kootti, Avargalai Aasarippuk Koodaaraththinidaththil Ange Unnodekooda Vandhu Nirkumpadi Sey.
17 appozhudhu Naan Irangivandhu Ange Unnode Pesi, Nee Oruvan Maaththiram Janangalin Baaraththai Sumakkaamal, Unnodekooda Avargalum Adhai Sumappadharkaaga Unmel Irukkira Aaviyai Avargalmelum Vaippen.

18 nee Janangalai Nokki: Naalaikkaaga Ungalaip Parisuththampannungal; Neengal Iraichchi Saappiduveergal; Engalukku Iraichchi Saappidak Koduppavar Yaar Endrum, Egipthile Engalukku Sowkkiyamaayirundhadhu Endrum, Karththarudaiya Sevigal Ketka Azhudheergale; Aagaiyaal, Neengal Saappidumpadi Karththar Ungalukku Iraichchi Koduppaar.
19 neengal Orunaal, Irandunaal, Aindhunaal, Paththunaal, Irubadhunaal Maaththiramalla,

20 oru Maadhamvaraikkum Pusippeergal, Adhu Ungal Mookkaale Purappattu, Ungalukkuth Thevittippogumattum Pusippeergal, Ungalukkulle Irukkira Karththarai Asattaipanni, Naangal En Egipthilirundhu Purappattom Endru Avarukku Munbaaga Azhudheergale Endru Sol Endraar.
21 adharku Mose: Ennodirukkira Kaalaatkal Aarulatchamper; Orumaadham Muzhuvadhum Pusikkumpadi Avargalukku Iraichchi Koduppen Endru Sonneere.
22 aadumaadugalai Avargalukkaaga Adiththaalum Avargalukkup Podhumaa? Samuththiraththu Machchangalaiyellaam Avargalukkaaga Serththaalum Avargalukkup Podhumaa Endraan.
23 adharkuk Karththar Moseyai Nokki: Karththarudaiya Kai Kurugiyirukkiradho? En Vaarththaiyinpadi Nadakkumo? Nadavaadho Endru, Nee Ippozhudhu Kaanbaai Endraar.
24 appozhudhu Mose Purappattu, Karththarudaiya Vaarththaigalai Janangalukku Solli, Janangalin Moopparil Ezhubadhu Peraik Kootti, Koodaaraththai Sutrilum Avargalai Niruththinaan.

25 karththar Megaththil Irangi, Avanode Pesi, Avanmelirundha Aaviyai Moopparaagiya Andha Ezhubadhu Permelum Vaiththaar; Andha Aavi Avargalmel Vandhu Thanginamaaththiraththil Theerkkadharisanan Chonnaargal; Solli, Pinbu Oindhaargal.

26 appozhudhu Iranduper Paalayaththil Irundhuvittaargal; Oruvanper Eldhaadh, Matravanper Medhaadh; Avargalum Pervazhiyil Ezhudhappattirundhum, Koodaaraththukkup Pogap Purappadaadhirundhaargal; Avargalmelum Aavi Vandhu Thanginadhinaal, Paalayaththil Theerkkadharisanan Chonnaargal.
27 oru Pillaiyaandaan Odivandhu, Eldhaadhum Medhaadhum Paalayaththil Theerkkadharisanan Chollugiraargal Endru Mosekku Ariviththaan.
28 udane Moseyinidaththil Ulla Vaalibaril Oruvanum Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaaranum Noonin Kumaaranumaagiya Yosuvaa Pradhiyuththaramaaga: En Aandavanaagiya Moseye, Avargalaith Thadaipannum Endraan.

29 adharku Mose: Nee Enakkaaga Vairaakkiyam Kaanbikkiraayo? Karththarudaiya Janangal Ellaarum Theerkkadharisanan Chollaththakkadhaaga, Karththar Thammudaiya Aaviyai Avargalmel Irangappanninaal Nalamaayirukkume Endraan.
30 pinbu, Moseyum Isravelin Moopparum Paalayaththile Vandhu Serndhaargal.

31 appozhudhu Karththaridaththilirundhu Purappatta Oru Kaatru Samuththiraththilirundhu Kaadaigalai Adiththukkonduvandhu, Paalayaththilum Paalayaththai Sutrilum, Indhappakkam Orunaal Prayaanamattum Andhappakkam Orunaal Prayaanamattum, Tharaiyinmel Irandumuzha Uyaram Vizhundhukidakka Seydhadhu.

32 appozhudhu Janangal Ezhumbi, Andru Pagalmuzhuvadhum, Iraamuzhuvadhum, Marunaal Muzhuvadhum Kaadaigalai Serththaargal; Konjamaai Serththavan Paththu Omar Alavu Serththaan; Avaigalaip Paalayaththai Sutrilum Thangalukkaagak Kuviththuvaiththaargal.
33 thangal Parkal Naduve Irukkum Iraichchiyai Avargal Mendru Thinnumunnekarththarudaiya Kobam Janangalukkulle Moondadhu; Karththar Janangalai Magaa Periya Vaadhaiyaal Vaadhiththaar.
34 ichchiththa Janangalai Ange Adakkampanninadhinaal, Andha Sthalaththukkuk Kiprodh Aththaavaa Endru Perittaan.
35 pinbu, Janangal Kiprodh Aththaavaa Ennum Idaththai Vittu, Aasaroththukkup Prayaanampanni, Aasaroththile Thanginaargal.
